OUTLINE : Patients receive oral lenalidomide daily day 1-21 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 18 course absence second disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Beginning course 4 , patient experience stable progressive disease also receive concurrent oral dexamethasone daily day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 subsequent course . Blood bone marrow sample collect periodically pharmacological correlative study . Samples analyze parameter immune activation , cell proliferation apoptosis , circulate tumor cell endothelial cell via flow cytometry ; global impact therapy immune cell subset via immunophenotype analysis ; angiogenesis via CD34 stain . After completion study therapy , patient follow periodically 2 year .
